top.description:
This file carries all the configuration options for running Tari-related nodes and infrastructure in one single file.
As you'll notice, almost all configuration options are commented out. This is because they are either not needed, are for advanced users that know what they want to tweak, or are already set at their default values.  If things are working fine, then there's no need to change anything here. Each major section is clearly marked so that you can quickly find the section you're looking for.
 A note about Logging - The logger is initialised before the configuration file is loaded. For this reason, logging is not configured here, but in `~/.tari/log4rs.yml` (*nix / OsX) or `%HOME%/.tari/log4rs.yml` (Windows) by default, or the location specified in the TARI_LOGFILE environment variable.

base_path.name: Common Tari data path
base_path.description: By default all Tari-related data-- the blockchain database, wallet information and peer information is stored in $BASE. If you wish to use another location, you can set this parameter.

message_cache_size.name: Message cache size
message_cache_size.description:
Tari is a 100% peer-to-peer network, so there are no servers to hold messages for you while you're offline.
Instead, we rely on our peers to hold messages for us while we're offline. This settings sets maximum size of the  message cache that for holding our peers' messages, in MB.

message_cache_ttl.name: Message cache TTL
message_cache_ttl.description: When storing messages for peers, hold onto them for at most this long before discarding them. The default is 1440 minutes = or 24 hrs.

denylist_ban_period.name: Blacklist period
denylist_ban_period.description: If peer nodes spam you with messages, or are otherwise badly behaved, they will be added to your denylist and banned. You can set a time limit to release that ban (in minutes), or otherwise ban them for life (-1). The default is to ban them for 10 days.

wallet_db_file.name: Wallet path
wallet_db_file.description:
The folder to store your local key data and transaction history. DO NOT EVER DELETE THIS FILE unless you
  a) have backed up your seed phrase and
  b) know what you are doing!

console_wallet_db_file.name: Console wallet path
console_wallet_db_file.description:
The folder to store your local key data and transaction history. DO NOT EVER DELETE THIS FILE unless you
  a) have backed up your seed phrase and
  b) know what you are doing!

base_node.description: If you are not running a Tari Base node, you can simply leave everything in this section commented out. Base nodes help maintain the security of the Tari token and are the surest way to preserve your privacy and be 100% sure that no-one is cheating you out of your money.

base_path.name: Base Path
base_path.description: Blockchain and settings will be stored in {}.

base_node.rincewind.description:
Rincewind is the first Tari test net. This network is for testing purposes only, but we encourage everyone to come and play onn it and try and break things.
Coins on this network **have no value**, and the network may be restarted without prior notice.

description.lmdb: Use the LMDB backend. Recommended for almost all use cases.
description.memory: Use the non-persistent memory backend. For testing only.
